response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value and significance, tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations. We believe its worth to you exceeds $1,200,000. After careful consideration, we propose to offer it to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an exceptional deal, providing you with a significant savings while ensuring you receive unparalleled quality and value. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of fostering a long-term relationship with you.", "product_price": 950000}
